otherNames: Inu to Hasami wa Tsukaiyou; InuHasa; Dog and Scissors; 犬とハサミは使いよう
synopsis: The absurd mystery comedy centers around Harumi Kazuhito, a high school boy who is obsessed with reading books. One day, he is killed in the middle of a robbery—and resurrected as a dachshund dog. Unable to read in his new form, the hapless Kazuhito now belongs to Natsuno Kirihime, a sadistic girl who uses scissors like a weapon.
